products.title: Bari Spc, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Appropriately named, the bari spc in pure displays a beautifully clean, lily white hue that serves as the perfect canvas for the lightly stitched texturing of the thick yet papery fabric. The adjustable louvres hang in an orderly fashion to convey a neat and contemporary aesthetic. Craft a refreshingly airy atmosphere in the master bedroom by combining the pure with matching white walls and bedlinen, opting for polished wooden floorboards and light wood furniture.

products.title: Bari Spc, Rhino - Vertical Blind
products.description: The beautiful midnight blue of the rhino gives a dreamy edge to this contemporary bari spc blind. Adorned with fine stitching in a matching blue, the fabric is sturdy and durable yet with a soft, paper-like texture. Complement the rhino with shimmering silvers for a modern, streamlined look in a teenager's bedroom. Choose white or pale grey paint for the walls, and match bedlinen to the deep blue of the blind.

products.title: Bari Spc, Cararra - Vertical Blind
products.description: A pretty shade of cream, the bari spc in cararra offers all of the practicality of its range along with a subtle sense of style. As well as the multifaceted functionality of the adjustable louvres, the fabric is backed with a solar protective coating to reflect unwanted sunlight, keeping overly warm temperatures at bay. The cararra is the ideal choice for taming bolder tones of plum or aubergine, making for a beautifully striking scheme.

products.title: Bari Spc, Tuscany - Vertical Blind
products.description: The deep, mature red of the tuscany brings a sophisticated yet country vibe to the ever practical bari spc range. Fully adjustable louvres hang neatly from the rail, providing a sleek and modern edge to this otherwise traditional blind. Match the dark red tuscany with soft, country creams for a contemporary take on country style. Go for wooden floors and cream walls, using a similar shade of red for additions such as throws and cushions.

products.title: Bari Spc, Manatee - Vertical Blind
products.description: In sleek slate grey, the bari spc in manatee offers a contemporary and clean aesthetic, complemented by barely-there stitching to provide texture and depth. Its solar protective coating gives this blind additional practicality by reflecting the sun's rays to keep the room nice and cool. Accent the manatee with a vibrant lime green in your home office to bring the grey tone to life. Opt for metallic, modern furniture for a hint of industrial style, going for unfinished wooden flooring and matching lime oddments.

products.title: Bari Spc, Sienna - Vertical Blind
products.description: The 'peaches 'n' cream' tone of the bari spc's sienna is as sweet as they come, displaying a pale, pinky peach hue with a somewhat vintage feel. The design of the blind itself, however, is sleek and contemporary, with a modern fabric hanging neatly in streamlined vertical slats. For pretty sophistication in an older child's, pair the sienna with a gentle cream hue, keeping the same, barely-there tones throughout the room.

products.title: Bari Spc, Perano - Vertical Blind
products.description: The sweet sky blue of the bari spc perano offers a cheery, summery hue, not contradicted by the clean, papery feel of the fabric, which is tough and durable. The neatly hanging louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light, air, and privacy. Give your kitchen a happy-go-lucky lift by settling the perano in amongst white units and tiles. By adding a sunshine yellow and plenty of light, rustic woods, you can achieve a contemporary country look sure to put a smile on your face during mealtimes.

products.title: Mayfair, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the contemporary mayfair in ivory within any dcor scheme for a fresh and elegant effect. Supple, fine threads create a nimble and relaxed, cotton-like cloth that works to form an effortless blind with simple style and a sophisticated finish. Blend the ivory with sumptuous linens in alike and gentle shades of silk and biscuit to craft an inviting surrounding, draping the blind in a rich royal blue to both frame the modern hue and introduce a striking burst of contrasting colour.

products.title: Mayfair, White - Roman Blind
products.description: Simply toned, this time with fresh white, the mayfair is a combination of deluxe silky threads and sumptuous cotton, creating a sheer and shimmering blind with elegant finesse, whilst sewn-in batons within each fold encourage a graceful fall and prevent the layers from sagging. Generate a luxurious effect by adorning the white with contrasting textures and intense colours, both to frame the silky blind and to add depth and personality.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Zest - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Sky - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Palace - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Blush - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Burgundy - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Magnum, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: A golden-hued woody shade, and with sliding translucent strips between the double-layered fabric, the magnum in brown is both attractive and functional. The overhead rail cassette hides the controls from view, making for a clean and streamlined effect. Add the brown to a forest green colour scheme, allowing the wood-look hue to complement the outdoorsy green. Include plenty of natural woods in the room and accent throughout with organic, forest and sage greens, deep browns, and understated golds for a coordinated and coherent look.

products.title: Magnum, Taupe - Day Night Blind
products.description: A gorgeous fusion of chocolate and cream threads, the magnum in taupe looks both natural and stylish. Of course, it's also amazingly practical, with versatile privacy and light control that can be easily adjusted to your will. Use the taupe in an all-white living room, where light and airiness are your top priorities. Fill the room with natural, naked woods, both light and medium, and organic fabrics such as hessian and wicker, finishing the room off with a woven jute rug.

products.title: Silver Birch, Larkspur - Roman Blind
products.description: Silver birch larkspur takes your eye on a journey of colour and form to create a stunning visual that will enrich the dcor in any home. The gentle blues and greens flow across the fabric, tracing out the true beauty of the countryside as they go. A feature wall in the same colour as the light blue will make the perfect partner to transform the living room. Add a couple of country-inspired watercolour prints to it and you'll be able to create the homely ambience that you'll never want to leave.

products.title: Heritage, Fern - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring muted pinks, greens, and greys, the heritage fern offers understated beauty, displaying an array of blossoms, leaves, and feathered friends. The creamy background makes the perfect base, offsetting the sweet colours beautifully. Pair the fern with pastel-toned walls for a romantic look in the master bedroom, where mixing it with fellow creams, pinks, and greys will mean it fits right in.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Capri - Roman Blind
products.description: A fun yet sophisticated take on the scandi birds design, the sweet capri features adorable birds in a two-toned blue, sat neatly on an oatmeal base. The pretty detailing on the creatures adds playfulness and personality, leading to a cute and characterful window covering. For a serious home office, with a hint of fun, hang the capri against white or matching oatmeal walls. The blue will encourage a studious feel to the room, whilst the bird illustrations portray sweetness and a recreational element.

products.title: Etched Vine, Feather - Roman Blind
products.description: The monochrome colour scheme of the etched vine in feather will bring a sense of peace and tranquillity to any dcor scheme. Beautifully delicate florals in pale ivory adorn a dove grey background, making this the perfect pick for those who just love subtlety. Add the feather to your living room for an understated colour scheme that you and your guests will adore. Place against pale lemon yellow walls and accent throughout the room with more light grey tones and the occasional pop of yellow.

products.title: Calder, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the elusive and calming hues of the calder in eau de nil in your dcor for a cool and contemporary look. Made from a nimble cloth and decorated with dusty blue, fawn, and oatmeal stripes, this gorgeous roman creates a sophisticated and graceful style. Combine the eau de nil with a subtle base of biscuit or ivory and distinctive oddments and furnishings in shades of chalky blue, adding layers of opulent linen and cosy fabrics for a warm and inviting feel.

products.title: Cluck Cluck, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: On a dove grey background sit an array of sweet chicken illustrations, featuring teals, charcoals, and limes. The white and grey offset these richer colours easily, resulting in the canvas of coordinated yet always interesting colour imagery that we call the cluck cluck kiwi. Combine the kiwi with white or palest grey walls, and accent throughout with limes and teals. Go for contemporary furniture and clean, sleek lines, perfect for a study or modern guest bedroom to relax in as you please.

products.title: Zoom, Paintbox - Roman Blind
products.description: The hand-painted look of the zoom in paintbox gives a fun and eclectic feel. Almost everyone's favourite colour is present, including shades of orange, blue, red, and green, so it will appeal to all ages. Opt for multicoloured fun in the kitchen, presenting the paintbox amidst white walls and units, and ornaments, oddments, wall hangings, and utensils in the remaining shades. Imagine how much fun you and the family will have picking out coordinating items in the various colours.

products.title: Calder, Porcelain - Roman Blind
products.description: Transform your home by adding the subtle colour and eye-catching arrangement of the calder in porcelain. This handsome blind is made from a cotton fresh fabric to form a serene feel with a contemporary style. Create a humble and sophisticated look in your master bedroom by combining the porcelain with a soft palette and modern designs. Develop the chalky blue or muted sage green shades with correlating fabrics and cushions, formed on a base of subdued grey for tranquil and elegant feel.

products.title: Hound Dog, Dess - Roman Blind
products.description: Hound dog dess is a cute and characterful pattern of elongated sausage dogs in white on a background of spearmint aqua. You might find it difficult not to fall in love with dess, and if you opt for this blind for a child's room, you'll surely find them all named within days. Add this sweet roman blind to a child's bedroom, alongside soft white walls and matching aqua bedding. Or alternatively, bring a little fun into a hallway or cloakroom, opting for coordinating whites and mints throughout.

products.title: Emi, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: To help maximise a smaller space, use soothing pastel shades and attractive prints like the emi mulberry blind. A delicate arrangement of white and mauve inspired flowers sits on a soothing oatmeal base providing a refreshing burst of personality to any room in the home. Choose material in hues that will complement the striking colours of the mulberry, sticking to a comforting palette of dusky pink, mauve, and little bursts of fuschia.

products.title: Calder, Hydrangea - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate an elegant finish to an impartially toned room by adding a touch of delicate colour with the calder in hydrangea. This sumptuous roman blind displays an array of vertical stripes in soft lilac, oatmeal, and contrasting white, forming simple sophistication in any part of the home. Merge the hydrangea with subtle shades of white, fawn, and mushroom to create a soothing and relaxing ambience, adding pops of colour with lavender and lilac finishes.

products.title: Maps, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: A world map in classic blue and white tones, the maps duckegg is sure to be a winner in any home. Use it to plan your travels, help your youngsters with their homework, or just to dream yourself away from it all. Add the duckegg to a home office or study, or to a studious teenager's bedroom, where you can save yourself some wall space by having a map in the window rather than on the wall. Accent with neutral colours, using the occasional pale blue to bring out the colour of the blind.

products.title: Superstar, Marine - Roman Blind
products.description: A vivid mix of dark denim blues, berry reds, and stone greys, the superstar mar offers a star-filled canvas full of fun, colour, and vibrancy. Reminiscent of the great british or usa flag, this is a blind that will appeal to all ages. Brighten up a family bathroom by adding a fun decor scheme that the kids will love. Stick to a light base of white tiling and suites, and choose blue towels and mats, with accessories and ornaments in the deep gorgeous red of the blind.

products.title: Superstar, Denim - Roman Blind
products.description: Stonewashed denim mixes with a fresh, vibrant cobalt and a subdued stone grey in this bright yet calming offering from the superstar range. The gentle drapes of the roman blind soften the effect of the angled stars, resulting in an eclectic and fun feel that will work in any home. Fun shapes such as these don't have to be restricted to children's bedrooms and playrooms. Why not give your office a funky yet calming vibe by hanging the denim in there amongst cool baby blue or pure white walls, accessorising with white furniture and matching blue fabrics? Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.

products.title: Lilium, Ebony - Roman Blind
products.description: A jet black background takes centre stage in the pretty lilium ebony, covered in sweet, traditional florals with an oriental look and feel. The fabric is one of their smoothest, silky to the touch, making it the perfect suppleness for folding into a gentle roman blind drape. Use the ebony to create a beautifully elegant bedroom decor scheme, placing it against a soft, pinky cream to match that of the fabric.

products.title: Flower Power, Tangerine - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring sunny orange, soft grey, and pretty sky blue, the flower power in tangerine displays, you guessed it, an array of florals in cutesy yet contemporary style that's sure to charm both you and your guests, wherever this blind is placed in your home. The lively hues of the tangerine are perfect for a downstairs hallway or upstairs landing, where it will sit pretty against a pale dove grey wall, along with orange accents in the form of ornaments, trinkets, and wall art.

products.title: Stags, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The stags charcoal would make a stunning addition to any country home, whether traditional or contemporary. A grey and oatmeal base features gorgeous prints of regal stags in a deep charcoal grey, offering a neutral canvas that could match a range of colour schemes. Give this rural accessory a home in the guest or master bedroom, settling it amongst country checks and other rustic animal prints, such as rabbits or pheasants.

products.title: Manila, Cranberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The foliage pattern of the manila cranberry boasts a tropical colour scheme of lime green, jewel purple, and red cerise on a neutral background. The leaves overlap beautifully, making the pattern intricate and pretty. Go for a tropical vibe in your guest bedroom, setting the cranberry against a lime feature wall and accenting throughout the room with bold purple shades. Temper the look with plenty of whites, so as not to overpower the room with too much colour.

products.title: Bowland, Hydrangea - Roman Blind
products.description: Absolute in adding prettiness and colour to any decor, the bowland hydrangea is both beautifully embellished and fantastically made. The delicate florals, in heather, lilac, sage, and mint, sit on a bed of oatmeal, made from a lightly textured fabric that adds character and depth. Revamp a plain hallway or landing by using the gorgeous hydrangea as an alluring window feature. Keep the walls and flooring light and neutral, and use pretty wall prints and occasional flower arrangements to complement the colours in the blind.

products.title: Etched Vine, Fern - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll just fall in love with the delicate florals displayed in the etched vine fern. Think lime-toned mustard beautifully interrupted by gentle white and soft grey blossoms. The 100% cotton fabric folds sweetly into neat roman folds, accentuating the mild pattern of the blind. Add the fern to your home office for a colourful yet relaxing look and feel. Set against soft white or pale grey walls, and accent throughout the room with matching yellow tones, opting for clean, contemporary furniture and minimalist soft furnishings.

products.title: Maps, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Made for the adventurer in us all, the maps in grey offers a subtle nod to the travels we'd all like to take - or perhaps already have. By hanging this in your window, you won't need a map on the wall, and you can see the whole world from inside your home. The grey would make a fantastic addition to a study or den, and you could choose to go monochrome with white or pale grey walls and black and white furnishings and accessories.

products.title: Smash, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: In grafter's grey, this fun edition from the smash range incorporates the typical geometric patterning in a casual, hand-painted style, this time in ice white. The cloth used is a tightly woven linen, which boasts a high quality and long-lasting durability. Use the jet to form a studious space to work in, whether this is your home office, work studio, or a teenager's bedroom. Keep the walls white in order to maintain a light and airy feel, and insert a pop of colour in berry red, funky violet, or petrol blue to add personality and charm.

products.title: Emi, Chintz - Roman Blind
products.description: Guaranteed to add floral charm and elegant finesse to a sophisticated dcor, the emi in chintz is made from a relaxed, linen-like fabric, flaunting sweetly designed, blossoming branches in a subtle palette of cream and oatmeal, with quick bursts of cerise. Transform a neutrally toned dining area into a welcoming and stylish haven by adding a delightful print and gentle flurries of colour. Stick to a biscuit or ivory base, adding mocha, cream, and latte tones for an overall soothing ambience, and include cherry red accessories for a coordinated finish.

products.title: Emi, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the everlasting, chic shade of aqua blue in your dcor with the emi in duck egg, which showcases a charming floral print in white and plum, with earthy toned branches in mossy green and muted lime, all displayed on a soft, linen-like cloth for effortless style. Produce an elegant and artistic scheme by including the delicate and distinctive blossoming print of the duck egg in your guest bedroom.

products.title: Manila, Lagoon - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring tropical shades of blue, green, and yellow, the manila in lagoon offers a pretty pattern of foliage overlapping to make a stunning and unique work of art. This nature-inspired roman blind is made from 100% cotton, giving it a high quality finish in perfect roman folds. The lagoon is sure to brighten up any utility, cloakroom, or hallway, so place it against white or off-white walls, and choose foliage-themed wall art to continue the look.

products.title: Batik, Saffron - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate a fashionable ray of sunshine with the stylish and attractive batik in saffron. The neat and nimble white fabric is juxtaposed by less tidy, artistically styled brushstrokes in greys, taupes, and yellows, adding both character and charm. Meld the trendy saffron with dove or slate grey walls for a fully coordinated look in a contemporary dining room. Use rugs, throws, cushions, and lamps to pick out the mustard and daffodil hues in the fabric to add life and vibrancy to the whole room.

products.title: Helix, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: The helix in grey displays contemporary patterning of neatly drawn florals coloured in varying shades of grey, ranging from stone to charcoal. The cool white background allows the imagery to pop from the canvas, making the blind simultaneously striking yet understated. Use the grey to temper a brightly coloured feature wall painted in a rich red or burnt orange shade, perhaps in the dining room or den.

products.title: Heathland, Rouge - Roman Blind
products.description: Welcome a vibrant burst of life into your home by including the artistic and eye-catching print of the heathland rouge. The relaxed and nimble cloth invokes a casual and inspiring mood, whilst the creative foliage design with its unique, rich plum hue adds personality and colour. Create a sophisticated look by including a rich and lavish feature colour, sticking to a classic ivory base to help to enhance the sumptuous shade.
